Pre-Game Insights: Sir Lockselot: Coming off a heart breaking loss to the Kings I love a good bounce back spot here from the Heat. The Suns have had some very close wins recently and I believe they are due. Heat matchup very well against them
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Heat averaged 12.7 turnovers per game (1,038 turnovers/82 games) last season -- T-5th-lowest in the NBA; the Suns forced 12.7 turnovers per game last season -- 7th-lowest in the NBA.

The Suns allowed opponents to shoot 33% from three in close and late situations last season -- 10th-best in the NBA; the Heat shot 32% from three in close and late situations last season -- 2nd-worst in the NBA.
